answers.answer: hi iam 38weeks and 2days i had an appt today and doctor said i had lots of protein to higher then my last appt,he send me to thw hospital to get blood work and urine and knw has me on a 24hr urine collection iam scared to

My Dr. Is having me come back Thursday to recheck my blood pressure and then a follow up appointment tuesday. He mentioned the 24hr urine collection to me but isn't having me do it yet. Hopefully everything turns out okay for you!

question: I'm 30w&3d pregnant. At my last appointment 2 weeks ago, I was told I had high/elevated blood pressure & at my appointment today It was the same, but a little higher than last time. I also had a trace of protein in my urine. I'm worried I'm going to have preeclampsia and was wondering if any other moms had these signs and everything ended up being okay or if they had preeclampsia...
title: Preeclampsia...
